00003 #ifndef __SESWRAPPER_COMMON_HPP__
00004 #define __SESWRAPPER_COMMON_HPP__
00005 
00006 #include <string>
00007 #include <vector>
00008 
00012 namespace CommonNS
00013 {
00024   template<typename T> int split(std::string buffer, const std::string &delimiter, std::vector<T> &result)
00025   {
00026     result.clear();
00027     int pos = buffer.find(delimiter);
00028     while (pos != buffer.npos)
00029     {
00030       if (pos > 0)
00031         result.push_back(buffer.substr(0, pos));
00032       buffer = buffer.substr(pos + delimiter.length());
00033       pos = buffer.find(delimiter);
00034     }
00035     if (buffer.length() > 0)
00036       result.push_back(buffer);
00037 
00038     return result.size();
00039   }
00040 }
00041 
00042 #endif
